p: Regarding hepatitis B vaccination, 23.5% (n = 8,412) of the individuals reported being unvaccinated and 47.4% (n = 16,970) did not know if they had been vaccinated. From the 10,388 (29%) conscripts who reported having taken the vaccine, only 788 (7.9%) reported having taken the 3 recommended doses, while 1987 (19.8%) took 2 doses, 1935 (19.3%) received 1 dose, and the remaining conscripts did not know how many doses they had taken (n = 5,327; 53.1%).
